NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) is up 0.90% today.



 NVDA has an Overall Score of 72. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on NVDA!
See Full NVDA Report





NVDA stock closed at $624.65 and is up $5.64 during pre-market trading. Pre-market tends to be more volatile due to significantly lower volume as most investors only trade between standard trading hours.

NVDA has a strong overall score of 72 meaning the stock holds a better value than 72% of stocks at its current price. InvestorsObserver's overall ranking system is a comprehensive evaluation and considers both technical and fundamental factors when evaluating a stock. The overall score is a great starting point for investors that are beginning to evaluate a stock.

NVDA gets a average Short-Term Technical score of 60 from InvestorsObserver's proprietary ranking system. This means that the stock's trading pattern over the last month have been neutral. NVIDIA Corp currently has the 72th highest Short-Term Technical score in the Semiconductors industry. The Short-Term Technical score evaluates a stock's trading pattern over the past month and is most useful to short-term stock and option traders. 




NVIDIA Corp's Overall and Short-Term Technical score paint a mixed picture for NVDA's recent trading patterns and forecasted price.
